name: Adding a task in table using expressions

steps.name: Given I am on the main application page
Loading: https://trello.com/
Refreshing the current page
When I click on element located `By.xpath(//ul[contains(.,'Create new board')]//div[text()="vividus"])`
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //ul[contains(normalize-space(.),'Create new board')]//div[text()[normalize-space()="vividus"]] is equal to 1
Pass: An element with attributes XPath: '//ul[contains(normalize-space(.),'Create new board')]//div[text()[normalize-space()="vividus"]]'; Visibility: VISIBLE; exists
Pass: An element with attributes: ' XPath: '//ul[contains(normalize-space(.),'Create new board')]//div[text()[normalize-space()="vividus"]]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' exists
When I initialize the ｟STORY｠ variable `task` with value `#{generate(Witcher.quote)}`
Saving a value 'No Lollygagin'!' into the 'STORY' variable 'task'
When I click on all elements located `By.xpath(//span[@class="placeholder"])`
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //span[normalize-space(@class)="placeholder"] is equal to 1
Pass: The elements to click number of elements is a value greater than <0>
Pass: There is at least one element with attributes ' XPath: '//span[normalize-space(@class)="placeholder"]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' number of elements is a value greater than <0>
When I enter `${task}` in field located `By.xpath(//input[@name='name'])`
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //input[normalize-space(@name)='name'] is equal to 1
Pass: An element with attributes XPath: '//input[normalize-space(@name)='name']'; Visibility: VISIBLE; exists
Pass: An element with attributes: ' XPath: '//input[normalize-space(@name)='name']'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' exists
Entering text "No Lollygagin'!" in element
When I click on all elements located `By.xpath(//input[@value="Add List"])`
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //input[normalize-space(@value)="Add List"] is equal to 1
Pass: The elements to click number of elements is a value greater than <0>
Pass: There is at least one element with attributes ' XPath: '//input[normalize-space(@value)="Add List"]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' number of elements is a value greater than <0>
Then field located `By.xpath(//textarea[text()="${task}"])` exists
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //textarea[text()[normalize-space()="No Lollygagin'!"]] is equal to 1
Pass: A field with attributes XPath: '//textarea[text()[normalize-space()="No Lollygagin'!"]]'; Visibility: VISIBLE; exists
Pass: An element with attributes: ' XPath: '//textarea[text()[normalize-space()="No Lollygagin'!"]]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' exists
